extensionDescription.message: An intelligent bookmark management tool that uses AI to automatically categorize, summarize, and tag your bookmarks.

addCurrentPage.description: Button text to add the current page as a bookmark.

settings.description: Button text to open the options page.

noBookmarks.description: Message shown when the bookmark list is empty.

processing.description: Toast message indicating an operation is in progress.

taskQueued.message: AI analysis task has been queued.
taskQueued.description: Toast message when a new bookmark is added and queued for AI processing.

pageExists.description: Toast message when trying to add a duplicate bookmark.

noActiveTab.message: Could not find an active page to bookmark.
noActiveTab.description: Error message when no active tab is available.

operationFailed.description: Generic error message for a failed operation.

aiProcessing.description: Status text for a bookmark being processed by AI.

aiFailed.description: Status text when AI analysis has failed for a bookmark.

importBookmarks.description: Button to import bookmarks from the browser.

aiConfig.description: Button and modal title for AI settings.

qaSystem.description: Button and modal title for the Q&A system.

searchPlaceholder.message: Search in title, summary, category, URL...
searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the search input on the options page.

close.description: Title for the close button on modals.

aiProvider.description: Label for the AI provider selector.

apiKey.description: Label for the API key input.

model.description: Label for the AI model selector.

configSaved.description: Toast message when AI config is saved.

languageChanged.description: Toast message when language is changed.

importSuccess.message: Successfully imported $count$ new bookmarks. AI analysis is in progress.

importNoNew.description: Toast message when there are no new bookmarks to import.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
confirmDelete.description: Confirmation message before deleting a bookmark.

bookmarkDeleted.description: Toast message when a bookmark is deleted.

regenerateRequestSent.message: Request to regenerate AI data has been sent.
regenerateRequestSent.description: Toast message when regenerate is clicked.

taskAlreadyQueued.message: This task is already in the queue.
taskAlreadyQueued.description: Toast message for a task that is already queued.

aiRegenerateStarted.description: Toast message when AI regeneration begins.

keyPoints.description: Label for the key points section.

rootFolder.description: Breadcrumb text for the root folder.

noMatchingBookmarks.description: Empty state text for search with no results.

folderEmpty.description: Empty state text for an empty folder.

deleteFolder.description: Context menu item to delete a folder.

confirmDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete the folder '$folderName$' and all its contents? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteFolder.description: Confirmation message before deleting a folder.

addToBookmarks.description: Button to add a recommended site to bookmarks.

aiAnswer.description: Header for the AI's answer in the Q&A modal.

alreadyBookmarked.description: Label indicating a recommended site is already in the bookmarks.

askQuestion.description: Button text to submit a question in the Q&A modal.

cancel.description: Button text for canceling an action.

contextMenuTitle.description: Title for the context menu item.

editNotes.description: Tooltip for the button to edit notes.

folderDeleted.message: Folder and its contents have been deleted.
folderDeleted.description: Toast message when a folder is deleted.

newRecommendations.description: Header for new website recommendations in Q&A.

notesPlaceholder.message: Enter your private notes here (e.g., account, password). They are stored locally and will not be uploaded.
notesPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the notes textarea.

notesSaved.description: Toast message shown after notes are saved.

practicalTips.description: Header for practical tips in Q&A.

qaFeature1.message: Understand your questions in natural language.

qaFeature2.message: Find the most relevant bookmarks you've saved.

qaFeature4.message: Recommend new websites based on your interests.

qaQuestionLabel.description: Label for the question input text area in the Q&A modal.

qaSearchingBookmarks.description: Loading message shown after a question is asked.

qaSystemDescription.message: This system helps you find answers and recommendations based on your bookmarks. It can:
qaSystemDescription.description: A short description of what the Q&A system does.

qaSystemTitle.description: The main title for the Q&A system info box.

qaTip.message: Tip: Try asking things like 'How to learn JavaScript?' or 'Recommend some design tools.'
qaTip.description: A helpful tip for users on what to ask.

questionPlaceholder.message: Enter your question, e.g., 'tools for PDF to PPT'
questionPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the question input in the Q&A modal.

recommendationReason.description: Label for the reason why a site is recommended.

relatedInBookmarks.description: Header for existing bookmarks related to the Q&A.

resetQA.description: Button to reset the Q&A interface to ask a new question.

verifying.description: Label indicating a recommended URL is being verified.

visitSite.description: Button to visit a recommended website.
